text: While it isn't my favorite, I still enjoyed it.  The sevice was quick and the cashier was super friendly.  We ordered two pizza.  The cheese was good.  The crust was the best part.  The other pizza was okay. I wish there was more seasoning on that one.  Overall, it was a good experience and a fair pizza.

text: Thin crust pizza was way too over cooked.   Waitress only came to table to take order,  deliver food, then about 45 mins later to give check.   I had to get up and get ice water two times and she still never came to table to check on the drinks of the other 4 people at the table.

text: It really depends on who is working if the food is good and if you will get good service.

text: A nice place for large parties but depending on the evening you can have different levels of promptness with your server. Food is what you would expect from Pizza Hut, tasty enough but i feel too greasy afterwards.
